source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Helmet of Radiant Glory

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 908,458 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 352,618.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gloves of Radiant Glory

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 869 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 869 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Barricade of the Endless Empire
